§ 3422. Office of Inspector General There shall be in the Department an Office of Inspector General, established in accordance with chapter 4 of title 5. (Pub. L. 96–88, title II, § 211, formerly § 212, Oct. 17, 1979, 93 Stat. 675; renumbered § 211, Pub. L. 103–382, title II, § 271(a)(2), Oct. 20, 1994, 108 Stat. 3929; amended Pub. L. 117–286, § 4(b)(41), Dec. 27, 2022, 136 Stat. 4348.)
Editorial Notes Prior ProvisionsA prior section 211 of Pub. L. 96–88 was renumbered section 210 and is classified to section 3421 of this title.
Amendments2022—Pub. L. 117–286 substituted “chapter 4 of title 5.” for “the Inspector General Act of 1978.”
